--- alter_table_add_column_if_not_exists.sql
alter table foo add column if not exists baz string(max) not null

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AddColumn{
    Add:         16,
    IfNotExists: true,
    Column:      &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: 61,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 41,
        NameEnd: 44,
        Name:    "baz",
      },
      Type: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
        NamePos: 45,
        Rparen:  55,
        Name:    "STRING",
        Max:     true,
        Size:    nil,
      },
      NotNull:        true,
      DefaultExpr:    (*ast.ColumnDefaultExpr)(nil),
      GeneratedExpr:  (*ast.GeneratedColumnExpr)(nil),
      IdentityColumn: (*ast.IdentityColumn)(nil),
      Hidden:         -1,
      Options:        (*ast.Options)(nil),
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS baz STRING(MAX) NOT NULL
